t: My Soul Waits for the Lord
Out*pn of the depths I cry to you, O Lord!*s
O*ld Lord, hear my voice! Let*ln your ears be attentive to*ld the voice of my pleas for mercy!
If*pn you, O Lord,*s should mark iniquities, O*ld Lord, who could stand?
But*ln with you there is forgiveness, that*ld you may be feared.
I*pn wait for the Lord,*s my soul waits, and*ld in his word I hope;
my*ln soul waits for the Lord more*ld than watchmen for the morning, more*ld than watchmen for the morning.
O*pn Israel, hope in the Lord!*s For*ld with the Lord*s there is steadfast love, and*ld with him is plentiful redemption.
And*ln he will redeem Israel from*ld all his iniquities.
